nodes.text: TR-01L was a security droid owned by the Guavian Death Gang on Batuu. In 34 ABY, TR-01L was encountered by C-3PO and a droid repair technician, who attempted to negotiate with it in order  to rescue R2-D2 from the Guavian Death Gang.
TR-01L first appeared in the VR game Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge. Although its name isn't spoken aloud in Tales from the Galaxy's Edge, it was identified in the subtitles for the game.
